name: Helen Gezahegn
description: Responsible for managing the general executives, setting a strategic direction for Ada's Team, creating meeting agendas, and more.

name: Katherine Patenio
description: Responsible for organizing and planning meetings, recording meeting minutes, and maintaining internal communication within the executive team and committees.

name: Amrees Almonte
description: Responsible for scheduling Ada’s Base office hours and tutoring services, collecting information regarding student struggles, and advocating for changes on behalf of students to the department.

name: Amanda Nguyen
description: Responsible for reimbursements, setting a budget, tracking all incoming and outgoing cash flow, and applying for grants used by the student group for operations.

name: JuSong Baek
description: Responsible for maintaining the website, blog, social media, and Ada’s Base whiteboard/bulletin board. Also, collaborating with VP Communications in making posters and advertising for events.

name: Celina Shang
description: Responsible for tracking membership, sending out monthly newsletters, replying to emails, and collaborating with VP Digital Media in making posters and advertising for events.

name: Dorsa Nahid
description: Responsible for liaising with companies and industry partners to organize events with Ada's Team to enrich members’ university experiences.

name: Riona Wiberg
description: Responsible for acting as a liaison between Ada's Team and other student groups on campus with similar goals or missions. Including but not limited to: Student Group Services, BearsDen, TeamUP Science, and WISEST.

name: Amy Xiang
description: Responsible for applying for grants, talking to professors regarding fundraising for conferences, and handling reimbursements for students attending conferences.

name: Chelsea Hong
description: Responsible for booking accommodations at conferences in foreign cities, coordinating flights to and from the event, and handling other logistics in the conference city.

name: Monica Bui
description: Responsible for increasing the presence of Ada's Team and the University of Alberta at conferences by hosting events, bringing promotional materials, and coordinating with the university.
